thread.title: Giants LB Jon Beason leaves with concussion
thread.title_full: Giants LB Jon Beason leaves with concussion - UPI.com

author: upi.com
title: Giants LB Jon Beason leaves with concussion
text:
EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. -- New York Giants starting middle linebacker Jon Beason was injured on the first series of Sunday's game against the San Francisco 49ers .
Beason was injured when 49ers running back Carlos Hyde rammed into him, sending him backward to the turf. Beason got to his feet, but was wobbly. He was able to jog off the field, but was taken to the locker room, where he was diagnosed with a concussion. He is out for the game.
The Giants, who are already down two linebackers thanks to Devon Kennard and Jonathan Casillas being inactive, replaced Beason with first-year player Uani 'Unga.
  Giants' Beason leaves practice Giants lock up Beason Giants to add LB McClain; re-sign Hynoski New York Giants lose three players to injuries
